long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Market Boss is an exciting game that you can now enjoy as a Chrome Extension.

Market Boss is a free online tycoon game where you take on the role of a supermarket manager. The objective is to sell various food items, upgrade your shop, and make as much money as possible. You start with a small supermarket and gradually expand and improve it as you progress.

In the game, you'll need to stock the shelves with goods, hire cashiers and helpers to speed up operations, and manage your staff from the office. Customers will visit your market looking for the products you're selling. By unlocking new shelves and additional sectors, you can offer a wider variety of food and beverages, attracting more customers to your growing supermarket.

The game provides a fun and engaging tycoon experience, allowing you to build and optimize your very own supermarket business. You can play Market Boss for free at the website https://monkeymart.org/.


*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee, https://monkeymart.org/
